tasks.task: ALTER TABLE `websites` ADD `ga_login` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `ga_code`, ADD `ga_password` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `ga_login`, ADD `ga_id` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `ga_password`;
ALTER TABLE `modules` ADD `display_in_menu` INT NOT NULL AFTER `controller_name`;
ALTER TABLE `users_groups` ADD `role_id` INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `users` ADD `created` DATETIME NOT NULL AFTER `online`, ADD `modified` DATETIME NOT NULL AFTER `created`;
ALTER TABLE `users_groups` ADD `is_deletable` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' AFTER `online`;
ALTER TABLE `templates` ADD `version` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL AFTER `layout`;
ALTER TABLE `websites` ADD `js_hack` LONGTEXT NOT NULL AFTER `css_hack`;
ALTER TABLE `websites` ADD `txt_secure` LONGTEXT NOT NULL AFTER `txt_mail_newsletter`;
ALTER TABLE `websites` ADD `footer_addthis` LONGTEXT NOT NULL AFTER `footer_bottom`;
ALTER TABLE `websites` ADD `slider_type` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' AFTER `css_hack`;
ALTER TABLE `contacts` ADD `message_backoffice` LONGTEXT NOT NULL AFTER `message`;
ALTER TABLE `posts_comments` ADD `message_backoffice` LONGTEXT NOT NULL AFTER `message`;
